Headline: #52A South Kedzie Temporary Reroute at 115th/Springfield
ShortDescription: 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 111th, and into the Pulaski terminal due to, street blockage at 115th/Springfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 111th, and into the Pulaski terminal due to, street blockage at 115th/Springfield.

Allow extra travel time.
